betterstats.translators.title: Translators
betterstats.contributors.title: Contributors
commands.statistics.clear.kick: Your statistics were cleared, which requires you to disconnect and re-join.
betterstats.client.gui.stats.panel.stats: There are no stats to show yet...
betterstats.config.gui_smooth_scroll.too: When enabled, scrolling the statistics panels will be 'smoothly animated'. Disable this if you play on lower-end devices, or if scrolling via mouse-wheel doesn't work at all for you.
betterstats.config.trust_all_servers_bss: When this mod is installed on a server, it offers more features. The 'betterstats' network protocol is how a 'betterstats' server communicates with the 'betterstats' client. With this enabled, the client will automatically tell the server it has 'betterstats' installed when applicable. With this disabled, you will have do it manually yourself each time you join a server.
betterstats.config.allow_stats_sharing.t: Allows the server to share your statistics with third-parties such as other players on the server. Please do note that anyone running the server is capable of modding the server in a way that ignores this preference. So while this shouldn't happen, I do wish to inform you that it is possible.
betterstats.player_badge.dedication.desc: You've shown true dedication! You have played on this world for at least 12 days (288 hours).
betterstats.player_badge.loyalty.title: Loyalty
betterstats.player_badge.loyalty.descrip: Your loyalty is commendable! You have played on this world for at least 24 days (576 hours).
betterstats.player_badge.the_next_genera: You've held the symbol of ultimate triumph - the Dragon Egg.
betterstats.player_badge.adventurous_tra:
Through mountains high and valleys low, you've traveled far, with much to show. Seeking a sight, a tale untold, a journey's measure in blocks of gold. And then you saw it...

You have traveled for at least 727,000 blocks.
betterstats.player_badge.perennial_survi:
You have managed to cheat death, for now. Will you continue to evade the inevitable?

You have survived for at least 12 hours.
betterstats.gui.hud_screen.tutorial_1: Right click a statistic ([Shift]+RMB) to add it here.
betterstats.gui.hud_screen.tutorial_2: Right click a HUD entry to modify or remove it.
betterstats.gui.hud_screen.tutorial_3: Press Escape (ESC) to close this screen.
betterstats.network.betterstatsnetworkha:
IMPORTANT:
By enabling this feature, the server will find out that you are using a modified client with 'betterstats' installed. To protect your privacy, do not use this feature on servers that may not allow modified clients or this mod.

Enabling this feature adds some extra features that are available when the mod is installed on the server as well.
betterstats.sas.first_death: %s just died for their first time.
betterstats.sas.first_death.hc1: %s just died for their first time. On the bright side, it likely won't happen again.
betterstats.sas.first_kill: %s just killed a %s for their first time.
betterstats.sas.first_death_to: %s just died to a %s for their first time.
betterstats.sas.custom: %s just increased their '%s' stat value to %s.
betterstats.gui.tpsbs.description: A GUI interface that allows you to view statistics from other sources, such as for example other player's statistics.
betterstats.gui.tpsbs.tab.ssps.descripti: Allows you to browse players that are present on the server you are currently connected to, and request their statistics from the server.
betterstats.gui.tpsbs.tab.ssps.requireme: This feature requires both you and the server, to have the latest (or better, the same) version of this mod installed.
betterstats.gui.tpsbs.tab.ssps.player_no:
The server could not find a player with the name you requested.

Please ensure the following criteria are met before retrying:
1. The name spelling and capitalization are correct
2. The requested player is online
3. The requested player has this mod installed
4. The requested player enabled 'stats sharing' in their config for this mod
betterstats.gui.tpsbs.tab.qs.description: With just one click of a button, allows you to quickly share your statistics with anyone using this mod, regardless of where they are right now.
betterstats.gui.tpsbs.tab.qs.tos_notice: Quick-share is a feature that works by using my (the mod developer's) servers. As such, it is subject to my TOS and Privacy Policy.
betterstats.gui.tpsbs.tab.qs.abuse_notic: To prevent spam and abuse, rate-limits and other limitations may apply.
betterstats.gui.tpsbs.tab.qs.step_1:
§eStep 1:
§7Click the button to quickly share the statistics file you are currently viewing. After that, the stats get uploaded, and you are given a 'quick-share code'.
betterstats.gui.tpsbs.tab.qs.step_2:
§eStep 2:
§7The person intended to view the shared statistics then types in the 'quick-share code', and clicks on the button to download and view the shared statistics.
betterstats.gui.qs_screen.upload.title: Uploading quick-share statistics...
betterstats.gui.qs_screen.upload.stage_2: Fetching cloud upload API endpoint URL...
betterstats.gui.qs_screen.download.title: Downloading quick-share statistics...
betterstats.gui.qs_screen.download.stage: Fetching cloud download API endpoint URL...
